products.title: Vitra Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Make the most of your space and keep your windows unfussy with the smart and versatile style of the vitra blackout cream roller blind. This well designed blind will accentuate a range of schemes thanks to the gentle cream colourway. This neutral toned fabric is bright and uplifting yet the blackout coating offers effective privacy and light exclusion.
